member.name: M:SOPRO.SOPool.DirectGet(UnityEngine.Transform,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Requests an element from the pool. The object will not be enabled
member.param: transform to use as the requested element parent.
Number of objs removed when PersistentPoolInScenes is true
true if obj was instantiated and parent setted, false otherwise

member.summary: Requests an element from the pool. The object will not be enabled

Number of objs removed when PersistentPoolInScenes is true

member.summary: Requests an element from the pool.
member.param: transform to use as the requested element parent.
action called on element before activation
Number of objs removed when PersistentPoolInScenes is true

member.name: M:SOPRO.SOPool.ReSize(System.UInt32,System.Action{UnityEngine.GameObject},UnityEngine.Transform,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion,System.Action{UnityEngine.GameObject})
member.summary: Resizes the pool to the given length, invoking an action on each destroyed element (if there are any) and each created element (if there are any)
